page.title: 20AN ELMSTEAD PUBLIC FOOTPATH.
page.content: The{public footpath}has two entrances, one on{Church Road,}the other on{Crockleford Road.}There is a {pond}along the path. On both sides of the path is a {ditch.}At one point the trees make an archway.There were many birds like {thrushes, black birds}and{robins}.In the ditches were many{insects.}We also found an old{metal sign}and a {motorbike wheel.}In one part of the ditch there was a brick wall with holes in it. The pond has a tree creeping along the water and then going up towards the sky.Not many animals could be seen but there were squirrels.On one side of the ditch was an{apple orchard} with about{50 rows}of trees and on the other side were fields of{barley {and{beans.
